entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
